ShutDownException - Exception in projectExceptions
This class is for creating customized exception to be thrown when the data to be changed is does not exists.
ShutDownException(String) - Constructor for exception projectExceptions.ShutDownException
constructs the exception and calling the super on the given parameter.
stopTask() - Method in class utils.DailyCouponExpirationTask
This method is called from the shutDown method in the coupon system class and sets the runnigFlag boolean to false, indicating to the thread, that it should not continue and return from the method (if he is not sleeping).
SYSTEM_SHUTTING_DOWN - Static variable in class utils.GeneralExceptionConstants
